item.title: Midland Travel Guide (Charlotte Metro/Piedmont/North Carolina/South/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do and see in Midland, North Carolina. Our travel guide features a list of places to visit, hiking and biking routes, and recommendations for accommodations, food, and local products.

item.description: Discover the natural beauty, cultural attractions, outdoor adventures, food, drink, lodging and more in Bahia de Loreto, Mexico.
